description:
Uruno is shy, cowardly and passive - everything the stereotypical wolf isn`t. He has a crush on the cute little Chiiko-chan, hoping that even though he`s useless, he will win her heart someday. He is very easily moved to tears and can be said to be quite gullible, particularly in the face of Yunihiko`s trickery.
Source: wiki
name: Uruno
